content: Living legend. Just finshed the trilogy. 10/10. The perfect superhero series. Please continue this series. This onspired me to write my own superhero universe.

I loved this trilogy and the character growth. That being said i also understand you hove only so many options. I would have loved to see more range in character ability choices and of the moment growth as the character has experiences. In short i wanted more of a personal ch oice in abilities and appearence in making my hero. But over all i enjoyed this the story did pull me in. LoL. I cant wait to play read more.
Really great!

I just spent the entire day going through each of these three stories out of morbid curiosity, and my verdict comes down to..it's a horrible story. Far too linear for a Choices game, the writer stacks on more twists than a twizzler that it gets really annoying, and he writes in plot devices that are then completely forgotten and have zero bearing on the story.
Fun, addicting and leaves you wanting more of the story
I really loved it, its an amazing end to the trilogy
heaps of fun, filled with lots of twists and turns, my type of an adventure!
Fun. Better than regular novels. Clever.
Awesome series keep it up
Absolutely my favourite series! Keep coming back over the years to play!
A masterpiece
Love this series!
great sequel hope for more books

My absolute favorite in the series. I smiled, I laughed, I was left in shock, I teared up. It's everything I could have hoped for and the plot was just intricate and immersive. Still salty at ending with a legend 95/100 on my first playthrough.... I had everything else perfect and got the achievements except this one which ugh.....
Incredible!
The coolest f-ing game ever!!!!!!!!
I have a tatoo of the logo so its good

This trilogy has made me fall in love with this author's works (Zachary Sergi for those who care). I don't know what I expected as the climax of this epic trilogy but this is far better than I hoped, your past decisions have meaningful results and you truly come to care about almost every character you meet in one way or the other. This is an author who truly cares about telling a great story through player decisions and I think this trilogy has supased community college hero as my favourite one of these stories which is something not many have done for me. Zachary Sergi, you have earned my respect for this incredible story and I can't wait to see it's eventual sequel and I can only hope it is as good as this trilogy as I can't expect him to surpass this experience. I loved it.

The story was okay. To enjoy the Choose Your Own Adventure I recommend 
ignoring your moral stats when making choices. The thing I liked the least 
about the game is the authors insistence of having characters who's 
dialogue revolves around their gender identity and sexual orientation. A 
political agenda should not take priority over characterization.
Got so intrigued by the whole series i  bingeread it all and didnt see i skipped an entire night

It's an acceptable finale to a really dumb story. The characters are still flat and the antagonists are not really believable, but at least there's action and you have some actual choices in how stuff will go.

I feel so emotionally drained right now. I've gone back to rate this entire series 5* but my overall review will be here.  You really see the character development of your character from the first book and this brings it to an extremely satisfying end. From the aspiring hero concerned about his job to the champion who knows whats truely important in this one. The second book really forced you to make some tough decisions and make or break relationships with characters you'd really like to keep and to see all your choices come together here and see them support you in the finale felt incredible and heartwarming to read. All the characters were unique and lovable and the situations in all three books added realism to the super hero genre that is rarely done this well. From all the bittersweet endings of the first two to the truely happy ending here (albeit with some tragic losses depending on your choices *I still miss a certain red striped girlfriend*). I have yet to find another interactive novel to pull my heart the way this trilogy has. If you're considering trying the series out. Do it. Its worth every penny. This series is amazing and I can see myself returning to read them all again once the feels have subsided. This is by far my best most recommended read.
I don't know what to do anymore after having finished this trilogy for the second time. If only there were more! Thank you for the ride, CoG!

A satisfy finale of the franchise. I do hope the length will be longer, but given the pace of the story, I think it is ok. I do love the interaction with other characters. People should really appreciate these interactive novels, they are just spectacular
A lot of drama. Not alot of heroes or powers.
Great ending to a great story

I just love this game so much. I've replayed it that many times and I probably will continue to do so because the story is just incredible. So immersive, so beautiful and I still can't get over the ending. Absolutely stunning writing and amazing romance. Highly recommend this to anyone on the fence. It's well worth he money and then some. Do yourself a favour and buy this, and play it for hours. You won't be disappointed.

Glad the series end cuz I sure as hell cant stand the intensity of this series. NOT in the bad way btw. Seriously, I'll be stuck playing this all day if there was another one. Great job COG! if you havent played the game since the beginning,  I suggest you do because its freaking satisfying to see your hero journey from the beginning till the end. Highly recommended!
Man.........I'm not gonna lie I am going to miss this series and I got attached to my character. At least there is college hero from hosted games but Overall definitely my favourite choice of games

The heroes rise trilogy is one of the best interactive novels I've ever read. Herofall is an excellent conclusion, it connects the dots in the story, and it's so good that I couldn't put it down after I started.

As with all the other installments of this series/world, the author does an incredible job of immersing the player/reader into situations that are palpable and calculating. I highly recommend all of the installments, and would say for the entertainment and delight of the stories: worth every penny.

So I just finished my third play thru of herofall. 1st play thru was how I thought most people would play it and I ended up with a legend score of 75 not that great but not terrible. 2nd time I went as lawless and corrupt as I could basicly score of 45. But I started a new one this last weekend that's thru all 3 games started with a legend score of -2 and that was playing in how I would if I was actually my hero and finished with a perfect 100 and it wasn't hard I just did what I thought was morally right in it. But you should defiantly get this. I only wish I could continue my hero's journey.

You know, I was almost not gonna say anything. I was almost just gonna move on and just go reheat my leftovers and go on with the rest of my day but... I just couldn't. This game... book... gamebook, whatever you want to call it, is amazing. The best of the series. Dark, gritty, emotional, and with choices that make my head spin... I would happily pay two, maybe even three times as much for it (don't let that go to your head CoG). I just have one thing to say before I finish this rambling review.  Holy. Slugger.

All I can say is... Wow. All three books have been absolutely amazing, and this book gives a perfect end for the whole trilogy. I love how diverse the paths are, and how interlinked all three books are. Totally worth the money spent!    This book is pretty much the one I've enjoyed the most in the whole trilogy thus far. Will recommend it any day, 11/10!
I hope they continue to make more of this game and a continuation as well.
A+ story telling man. What a bloody journey the author has brought us through.

Just realized that after all this time (I bought it when it first hit the play store) that I completely forgot to leave a review; the game was amazing, with great choices and characters. Don't hesitate to buy it
Aw slugger. Spent all my money on this seriesüòÇüòÇüòÇ didn't regret it tho. Such a wonderful story line.  I can not stop reading.
I love this game but it keeps restarting my progress. And it's done it three times so far and every time I go back through and redo my choices it does it again.

I loved this series so much! It is such a shame that it ends here but I really enjoyed it and look forward to anymore games that are made by the author I also would be thrilled to see more games made to continue this series and best of luck to the author.

I've read numerous interactive fiction novels like this and this one is by far the most satisfying. I binge read all three in this series in 4 days. Every lunch break and spare second I had went into it. Can't wait for redemption season. Every choice does matter unlike some I have read. Great job developers. Money well spent.
After getting emotionally attached to these stories made me extremely sad that my character's story ends here.
The best

This was a great end to the trilogy. Will say I really enjoyed it, and had more of an emotional investment into it than the other games. It can be serious , but doesn't take itself TOO seriously.Will definitely be checking back on this author.

I've played quiet a few interactive story games but the heroes trilogy is by far one of the best I've had the pleasure of enjoying well written with a plot that keeps you geusing and many unique and memorable characters loved every moment of it.

Another great game from Sergi. It was hard to wait for this to come out, but I think it was well worth it. My only gripe is that I hated how Black Magic and Lucky become basically interchangeable when clearly they're very different people. Nevertheless, this solidified the Heroes Rise trilogy as my favorite trilogy to come out of Choice and Hosted Games.
Can't recommend this highly enough
Can't wait for the second series

I would say something like "Make this into a book" or "Holy slugger I wish I could play this thing real time", but in all honesty both are already true. This is the best roleplaying I have ever experienced and I felt like I truly was my character, which is a very rare thing to find in a game. Great job. Would definitely recommend.
Please make more keep the hero universe alive!!
I can't express how fantastic this was!!
Really love this series, can't wait for the next book to come out.
Install this now!

I love this story. It fully immerses you into its world and the characters are lovable or perfectly detestable, as certain ones should be. I recommend, totally worth the money. Now I anxiously await The Hero Project: Redemption Season to come out, I'm excited!
The whole book series is pretty amazing
Who doesn't love an RPG trilogy.
This whole series was down right amazing!  :) you really feel invested in the story. ..I can't wait to read season 2...

I've played many choices of games but by far this was one of the best ones I've ever played, the hero's rise universe pulled me in and hit me with choices I never thought I'd have to make and the entire journey from the first to the last of the trilogy was well worth it.  I can't wait for the next season of this universe to come out because I'll be there playing it all over again.

I really would like to continue my game from the previous two books. I never received a save option in 'The Hero Project' so have to start again with new stats & history. It's a disappointing situation for an 'epic conclusion' in a trilogy :(

It's almost like an interactive Marvel movie. Complete with choices and consequences that Im sure real heroes would face in our society. Looking forward to more from this author and the next Hero Project!

This game is unbelievably good I beat all three of them in a week I seriously could not stop reading this stuff and to the people who made this game I like to give a sincere thank you this is by far one of the most enjoyable games I have played in my life and considering I normally go for graphically flashy games and this game has no graphics to speak of it really says a lot about the quality of the material
Have been hooked since the first one , need more pls!!!!

A beautiful, majestic conclusion to the Heroes Rise trilogy ! I really loved the slugger out of it ! Please make more adventure in this Heroes universe ! I heard a Hero Project 2 could be on the rails, I pray for it :D !

Where has this story been all my life? There really are no words to do this story justice (pun might be intended). It's the heart of what every hero's story wants to aspire to be, and reminds us all why we loves our heroes so much.
Having trouble downloading a save
I read the whole trilogy, Zachary Sergi is an excellent writer I very much look forward to anything else he writes in the future. Would rate 10 stars!!!
I have never encountered such superb story telling in a game! It's like someone took Buffy, Marvel and  Choose Your Own Adventure making them into a shot of awesome-awesome sauce.

What an end to an incredible trilogy! Story was fantastic throughout and I truly felt involved and connected to the characters. While I feel that this conclusion could have had a longer story with additional, less predictable, twists and turns (like its predisessors) it was still amazing. The regain power points system was a bit confusing though and opportunities to regain them seemed to appear randomly instead of having the choice to develop them. Still an amazing story and I'm going to have a 2nd run now.
Another great work, I am always very satisfied to read create your own adventure games. Thank you! Can't wait for another one.
The best of the heroes series
It's‚Äã  SO‚Äã epic
By far the best choice of yet. Loved every part of it. This chapter has the hardest choices in any game.
An epic conclusion to the trilogy. The only I wish that was different, was that there were more connected to this series. I would enjoy them all.
The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was because the ending with you loving Prodigal but she still dies was quite disappointing but apart from that the best choice book.
From the first to the last it has all been good and fun love the characters evey game has its own tone and it can be change with some simple choices . point is this game is great and worth getting
Amazing story line

Absolutely amazing. As a fan that followed since the first heroes rise, I've seen this series grow better and better. To the point where it's combat outshines some 3d games. A must series to experience.

I really enjoyed the triliogy. But what is up with the increased price, especially since the game feels shorter since it has less chapters? Either way, the ending was really sweet and the decision making in the game is better this time.
Loved it as I have most of their stories
Reminiscent of the old choose your own adventure books, but better! Persistent character development between the three is probably my favorite feature.

This was a wonderful read through and through. From The Prodigy to The Hero Project to Hero Fall I found this series to be thoroughly enjoyable and highly satisfying. The whole series has been a thrilling read and the RPG element was simply wonderful. The whole series was definitely worth buying and I highly recommend it to anyone else, even people that dint read books that often. I can't wait for new Heroes Rise and I'm anticipating a new story that's just as brilliant if not better than the original.
I couldn't put it down until I finished the whole series. The ending was really fitting for the hero. Hope they continue expanding their universe with more stories.
Love this so much!!! The whole series is incredible!!
Very great read many times and still great.

Heroes Rise is the absolute best choice game series I've played, and I've played a lot of them. Also helps that you can continue games across platforms via the site game save feature. That's very helpful.
Hope there is more!!!
A near perfect conclusion to the series. Couldn't have asked for anything better.
An amazing end to a fantastic trilogy
Perfectly addictive
So great, but can't buy the perfect guide, otherwise it'd get 5 stars. Sorry. Fix that.
Each book is amazing in its own right, but as a trilogy it's breathtaking
Like dayum
A very good way to end the series, a which i  would highly recommend
I was sad when it was over
This trilogy was so worth waiting for!  The story was engaging and the romantic element seemed important to the plot without being a mandatory subplot.  Fantastic.

A satisfying end to a trilogy but hopefully a start to more stories. I appreciate that many of the choices, consequences, and challenges are based on your character and,knowledge as a reader. In addition, that many of the  right choices are based off the choices and hero you were in previous games.

Though I can't put an actual number on it, this trilogy has a place in my top 10 games of all time. I am an extremely avid gamer too. I started of with choice of the deathless on steam a few months back, then was more impressed with choice of robots which is when i started getting attached to these characters, and the Herorise games....i mean i have a softspot for super heroes...but this, this was so satisfying and keeps me longing. I look forward to continued adventures from this wonderful developer.<3
Amazing
Wow ok this game rocked me to my core it was by far the best RPG I have ever played!! Well done guys well done

I can't get over how amazing this trilogy is for me! The story is unique and suspenseful; each new development was a huge, shocking surprise which I loved every minute of. Each character is different and even with all of them together they each stood out. My choices really affected the story. I've gone back several times just to see what new person my hero would turn into next! Fantastic and just...legendary!!!
My greatest heroes story continues! This game is great and I love the story!
One of the most well written storylines I have ever had the pleasure of reading.

Considering the trilogy as a whole, there are times where the author forces morality on you when you may feel differently on a specific issue. Even so, by the end of this, I found myself engrossed in the story. Shocking revelations, character redemptions, it really all came together in the end in a way that made the whole journey worthwhile. Would recommend this series 1000x over. *Spoiler ahead* if you value Jenny as a friend (or love interest if female) don't take any chances in the Melennial group tower.

Herofall doesn't suffer from the same perpetual state of helplessness and railroading that the other two games do, and it feels good! While the game (and all CoG games in general) really need a save system, Herofall is deserving of a buy.
Good story. Maybe they will have a 4th
Loved it, a great way to end the trilogy. Can't wait for the second phase. :-)
This game was so worth the wait! Enjoyed the new romantic choices, they were a pleasant surprise! Try this game if you wish you were a superhero, you won't be disappointed.

This game is so fun to play. Esspecially since the mechip helps you on thr choices to makr in battle so its a BIG help to have it. I am hoping that there would be another story! But I have a feeling this really is the end. Meeeeeh. I ended with black magic. At first I wasnt happy during the 2nd story but I really love him now in this story.
I recommend this to anyone who enjoys a good story.  I just finished the first two chapters and can't wait to dive into the final!
Keeps crashing

As other people have done, this is a review for the entire series as a whole. The story is fantastic. It is so well-done and I'm really, really going to miss it. I hope that there is more to come, and I highly recommend it.
Enjoyed the whole trilogy, hope to see more soon! :)

By far the best choice of series in my opinion. The only thing that bothered me at the beginning was not being able to choose my own powers (I prefer heroes with no actual powers, but that's just me) but I quickly got over that once I got into the story. Well done, choice of llc, well done!
I love the choice of games but the hero ones are the best!
Needs a restart button
Every installment to this epic was amazing and this end piece brought everything into an amazing finishing end.
I loved it
This is great! So much fun and real characterisation. Very well written. Buy all three parts!
I was wondering does anyone have encounter the same possible bug as i did? I have the royal ally badge from the hero project but i still couldn't get in the maze... i wonder lol

Its seriously a good ending to a story and I couldnt play this chapter without feeling some sort of pride in how far my hero came. You feel the progression of the story and the character that it makes you smile. You start off with nothing and push your hero through it all and he becomes a leader in all rites. I WOULD GLADLY SUPPORT A HEROES RISE TRILOGY 2! I really hope you do make one...keep this thing going.
I got the ending I wanted! Very well written, and very fun. Looking forward to future games.
Well written, has realistic consequences to what you choose (at least my choices seem so). Highly recc'd, has roughly around 2-5 hours of gameplay iirc.
Ultra fun

I'm rating not only this instalment, but the series as whole. Why? Well, I'm giving them all the same rating; also, the more time you invest in following your hero, the more difficult it becomes to put the story down. Just one more decision, one more chapter, etc. I spent many an hour past my bed time to discover what fate had in store for my dear protagonist. I'd recommend this to anyone who enjoys a great read and doesn't mind staying up late to get swept away by it's story. Well, Hero, will you rise?
The ending did justice to the previous installment of the game. It really is worth it.
It changes if you won by the choices and changes the flavor of the game based on choices.
Brilliant final piece, to this original work of awesome.
Tears at the end

What the heck happened?  This third installment of the heroes rise trilogy doesn't even compare to the first two.  It was short and anti-climactic.  And the five romance options?  What was the point in that?  There wasn't all that much romantic interaction!!!  I am blown away by how badly this one sucked.  So disappointed.
I would EASILY pay 40 bucks if these three were made into a visual novel.

This is by far the best choice of game I've played but it makes me rather sad to see the trilogy over! I think it would be nice though if the did a prequel to the series and made it were you could play as the sound or the fury depending on your gender and make a series out of that! Or maybe make one that comes from the future after this is all over and there's a new threat with a new hero and new characters but maybe be able to load your hero fall game so the storyline could have some original based things!
Sweet game.

Not a shred of a picture inside but fair enough it doesn't need it right? What sucks is 3/4 of the time you are reading dialogue and you don't really make that many decerning choices. Boring! I'd skip it.
Just an opinion but worst of the trilogy big let down
Amazingly thought out.

This is my favorite series of CoGs because of its consistent excellent writing and its abilty to great better with every installment. Even the choices you don't think will matter, like how the MC feels about a character, comes into play later. It is linear but that means when you make an important choice you feel the impact it has. My only problem is that a straight male MC can't romance Jenny. Its a nitpick but every other character changes there gender and sexuality to fit the MC's preference except her.
Wow... haven't finished it entirely yet, but I am always pleased with Zach's work. I will give a full review when I'm done :-)
I have played all of the games In the series and this was by far the best. Great choices and great fights. Recommend the whole series
Great ending to this trilogy! Loved it! I'd love to see a Villains Rise though, like a villain version. But anyways GREAT!!!

Amazing, fun, well written end to a great trilogy! I have never been so engrossed and lost in a game like this in a long long time. Big emotional ups and downs I would be smiling one second and almost crying another.    I hope Choice of Games LLC will do more games like this in the future!
Best series yet
The best text based game out there
I laughed, I shed a tear, I felt devastated, I achieve a sense of accomplishment,  i was loved. This is the best emotional joy ride I've been on!
What an amazing ending to a genius trilogy!
Sublime from start to finish. I love you guys.
Just fantastic. Amazing.
Absolutely mesmerizing!
Worth every penny.  Hard to put down.
So greatly written and such a great plot and characters!! I can't believe the trilogy is done but can't wait for Zach to expand the heroes rise universe!!!!!!!
Great wrap up. I loved it. Honestly, best choice of series.

Absolutely worth every penny. Could not put it down. And when I did I picked it back up very well done the whole 3 parts. Good choices lots of different endings. Now I just want more to the story. Please do more
Fun if you played the previous ones
It's my favorite of the 3 parts. If you love hero's this is the book-choice-game-thing you will love :0 I'm super happy with it

I loved how far your decisions could stretch the replay value of the last two games and this one provides the ultimate conclusion to all major and minor plot threads. No spoilers, but let's just say that my choices and imagination allowed my character to go through some pretty drastic and realistic changes. I ended the game in a place I never thought my character could be, but it all felt so natural and satisfying. Spent hours playing! Loved. Every. Second.
Best trilogy ever needs to be a movie
Really great ending. A good way to wrap things up. I hope there will be a season 2.
A great story line told through the titles. A little linear but the storyline is strong and not forced. Well worth it.
Truly an epic, well written ending to the Heroes Rise trilogy. On par or better than the first Heroes Rise, and a welcome return to form after the second Heroes Rise.
Fun strategic game. Wished i can see the list of achievements on my phone though.
They never hit you with a cliff hanger which I appreciate, the story and fun leaves you wanting more on its own. I love the series. Definitely try it you will love it.
What can I say? The most epic conclusion to the most epic interactive novel series ever!
Brilliant
Great ending to a great series. Had a lot of nostalgic moments. Wish it was a little longer but that's a minor thing given the quality of the story. Bittersweet to see it end
Really good conclusion to a great story. Only wish it was easier to get the romance started with jenny.
Amazing ending to a well-written trilogy. Defenitely worth the money, and satisfying as hell after all the crap that happens in the other stories.
Total. brain. explosion. On scale of 1 to 10 100
One of the best cog titles
This trilogy as a whole put every single other CoG offering to shame.  This is the ideal CoG authors should strive for.
Such a fun game, with interesting social and political themes and a broad range of choices!

I am really happy to get it as soon as the game available. The story was nice and smooth. I am happy with the ending of the game, one of the romance I went with, and the epilogue. I am so going to start to read all the heroes rise to see what other ending I can get.

This is a great ending to the Heroes series, which is my favourite Choice Of game. The story is good and it's making me want to go back and play the very first game again, because all the choices you make in the first two games actually roll over into this finale. The other commendable part of this game is the freedom to choose the gender and sexual orientation of my character - such a little choice that means so much! Highly recommended.
This was a great ending to the story.
to a brilliant series. best one in the trilogy, imo. way to end things off with a bang!

I am really enjoying this game but it has stopped 3 times due to an unknown script error. The first time lasted all day and the other two lasted a few minutes each. Other than that, the game is amazing!

This was absolutely amazing! The dialogue, the plot, relationships, just everything. Even the deaths! It was dramatic, heartwarming, intense, and everything that is included with a great story! It was well worth 2.99, it may be even worth more! 5 out of 5, for me! :D
I played since the first one and couldn't wait to get to this one it felt great beating this game finally I recommended it to people who love a good story
I love this!
Greatest ever !
Oh wow. Wow. Awesome. Definitely a must-have!
Just bought it. Can't wait to start it. Loved the previous two. Can't wait to go out on a high note!
Love it!
Zach has crafted another winner and given COG a gem for all of us to enjoy.
Awesome work
Love it! Gonna start the final chapter of the trilogy!
